text: Toome (or Toomebridge) is a village in Northern Ireland, in the United Kingdom. It is from Magherafelt and from Antrim. It is close to the River Bann. ==Population facts== On 29 April 2001 the United Kingdom government had a census and saw that there were 722 people living in Toome. They also saw that: *27.2% of the people were under 16 years old and 10.9% were over 60 years old *48.8% of the people were male and 51.3% were female *96.3% of the people were from a Roman Catholic background and 2.9% were from a Protestant background *6.2% of people aged 16â€“74 had no job.NI Neighbourhood Information Service ==References== Category:Villages in Northern Ireland Category:Settlements in County Antrim
title: Toome
